channel.title: series_if_you_want_it_make_it_so
channel.description: My thoughts and streams of consciousness organized into barely coherent posts about things

item.title: If You Want Something Make It So - Song Style
item.description: In grad school a professor of mine, Mark Hunacek, said one of the most profound things I've ever heard to the tune "if you want it, then make it so&qu
item.author: Nic Payne
